name: Penguin Survival Tap: Beach Village Resort
name_original: Penguin Survival Tap: Beach Village Resort
description:
Do you like fun, stimulating games with great looking graphics and non-stop action? If so, then you'll love the beach penguin! He's ready to go and get you moving!

What's a hungry guy to do? It's dinnertime and he means business. He loves to eat but he can't seem to catch a break. Good thing you're here to the rescue! Help him catch as much food as possible.

Like any good game, though, it's not as easy as it sounds. Although stuff will be tossed your way, and thanks to his appetite he'll want to catch it, you want to avoid the big items. Aim for the small ones!

With fun, colorful graphics and a simple interface, this is a game the whole family can enjoy. Lighthearted and entertaining, it's not often a game comes around that keeps you stimulated AND makes you smile!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
